last_episode_to_air.name: Nick of Time
last_episode_to_air.overview: The ghost will go, but will their future be saved?

name: Secrets of Sulphur Springs
overview: 12-year-old Griffin Campbell and his family move to the small town of Sulphur Springs and take ownership of an abandoned hotel rumored to be haunted by the ghost of a girl who disappeared decades ago. Griffin befriends Harper, a bright-eyed, mystery-obsessed classmate and together, they uncover a secret portal that allows them to travel back in time. In the past, they’ll attempt to uncover the key to solving this unsolved mystery, a mystery that affects everyone close to them.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In season two, Griffin and Harper unravel new mysteries about The Tremont, and Harper follows the real ghost back to the 1930s to learn more about her family's deep-seated connection to the hotel. When the power source to the time machine is unintentionally taken and the portal disappears, Harper becomes trapped in the past with her great-uncle Sam and great-great-grandfather Elijah, while her great-grandmother Daisy is left to navigate the present. With help from Savannah from her new life in 1962, the friends attempt to fix the time machine and bring back the portal before it's too late and their lives are forever changed.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: A new ghost checks into room 205 and starts wreaking havoc around The Tremont. After learning the evil presence will ruin their lives by 2024, the kids race to solve a tangled mystery in the past that may hold the key to defeating the ghost in the present and saving the Dunns and the Campbells from a very bleak future.

tagline: Every secret has its time and place.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Time
episodes.overview: Griffin Campbell and his family move to a new town and take ownership of an abandoned hotel in hopes of restoring it back to the lively vacation destination it once was.

episodes.name: Somewhere In Time
episodes.overview: Griffin and Harper realize they've time traveled to before Savannah's disappearance. When they go back again, they think they see Savannah getting taken into the woods.

episodes.name: Straight Outta Time
episodes.overview: Griffin and Harper learn the camp dance is coming up, and that is the day Savannah went missing! Later, Harper meets Jess, and learns her mom did go to camp and hated Savannah!

episodes.name: Time to Face the Music
episodes.overview: Harper asks Griffin to meet her at the portal after school, but, when Griffin gets home, he discovers his Grandfather has arrived for a visit.

episodes.name: Parsley, Sage, Rosemary and Time
episodes.overview: Ben is upset by the flurry of news reports marking the thirtieth anniversary of Savannah's disappearance, while Zoey and Wyatt see it as the perfect opportunity to finally capture her ghost on tape.

episodes.name: Time Warped
episodes.overview: A 12-year-old boy and a thrill-seeking classmate discover a secret portal that allows them to travel back in time and uncover clues about a mystery involving a girl who disappeared decades ago from a Louisiana town.

episodes.name: Long Time Gone
episodes.overview: Griffin and Harper sneak back through the portal to find a search party looking for Savannah.

episodes.name: If I Could Turn Back Time
episodes.overview: Griffin and Harper realize that Savannah could've traveled back in time.

episodes.name: As Time Goes By
episodes.overview: Once Griffin and Harper learn they can’t reopen the hatch to let Savannah in, they quickly go back through the portal.

episodes.name: No Time Like The Present
episodes.overview: Griffin and Harper successfully travel to the past, where they find Savannah working at The Tremont.

episodes.name: Time After Time
episodes.overview: Harper travels back in time to the date her father died in hopes of trying to change the outcome.

episodes.name: Only Time Will Tell
episodes.overview: Griffin, Savannah and Harper find themselves face to face with Harper’s carbon copy, Daisy, and the Tremont ghost sends Harper and Griffin an important message.

episodes.name: No Time to Waste
episodes.overview: Harper pretends to be Daisy to learn her family’s secrets, and Topher stumbles upon the hidden bunker.

episodes.name: Time Out
episodes.overview: Griffin frantically searches for the missing crystal and helps a panicking Daisy to navigate her modern surroundings; meanwhile, Harper has a cryptic vision at the springs.

episodes.name: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
episodes.overview: When Daisy struggles at pretending to be Harper, Griffin searches for the crystal to swap them. After the Twins don't hear from Topher, they try to capture the ghost themselves.

episodes.name: It's About Time
episodes.overview: When Sam can't get his Time Machine to work, Savannah vows to help him! Meanwhile, Griffin tells Daisy that he thinks Topher is hiding something and enlists her to find answers.

episodes.name: Crunch Time
episodes.overview: The Tremonts were duped by the Judge and have 48 hours to vacate their land. Meanwhile, when Griffin and Daisy rush towards the portal with the crystal, everything goes black!

episodes.name: Check-out Time
episodes.overview: Harper returns home and fills Griffin in on the deed, stolen land, and her visions of a fire. After Sam disappears, Savannah finds a note saying that he’s travelled to the future.

episodes.name: Time Is Not On Our Side
episodes.overview: The Campbell's and the Dunn's prepare for the Tremont’s Grand Re-opening! Harper and Griffin realize that the crystal is cracking which may prevent the Time Machine from working.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In season two, Griffin and Harper unravel new mysteries about The Tremont, and Harper follows the real ghost back to the 1930s to learn more about her family's deep-seated connection to the hotel. When the power source to the time machine is unintentionally taken and the portal disappears, Harper becomes trapped in the past with her great-uncle Sam and great-great-grandfather Elijah, while her great-grandmother Daisy is left to navigate the present. With help from Savannah from her new life in 1962, the friends attempt to fix the time machine and bring back the portal before it's too late and their lives are forever changed.

episodes.name: Time Won't Let Me
episodes.overview: Griffin, stuck in the future, learns the ghost ruins their lives. Harper and Savannah try bringing him back to the present.

episodes.name: Time in a Crystal
episodes.overview: Harper and Savannah retrieve Griffin from the future. Sam and Griffin face the grimmest truth, Topher is in a coma in 2024. The twins and Topher almost catch Savannah’s “ghost.”

episodes.name: Closing Time
episodes.overview: The twins arrive in the past and find Savannah. Griffin and Harper realize they need to go back to 1947 just as Ben makes the bunker off-limits.

episodes.name: Bad Judge of Time
episodes.overview: The kids learn the ghost has been listening to them and is changing up his malevolent plans.

episodes.name: Time Waits For No One
episodes.overview: In 1947, Harper and Griffin meet Ruby. Sarah becomes increasingly freaked out by the ghost.

episodes.name: Time Reveals All
episodes.overview: Returning to the past, Griffin and Harper watch a murder unfold. The twins and Topher go to an unknowingly familiar someone for help.

episodes.name: Scream Time
episodes.overview: It’s time to get rid of the ghost.

episodes.name: Nick of Time
episodes.overview: The ghost will go, but will their future be saved?

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: A new ghost checks into room 205 and starts wreaking havoc around The Tremont. After learning the evil presence will ruin their lives by 2024, the kids race to solve a tangled mystery in the past that may hold the key to defeating the ghost in the present and saving the Dunns and the Campbells from a very bleak future.
